availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County and Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Phoebe Igo. Father of Sarah J. Igo, William T. Igo, John C. M. Igo, and Servilla Igo. Farmer in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Division 2, p. 46B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 590.
